name: Scratch Cat Sues Scratch
description:
Full Title : Scratch Cat goes to scratch offices to sue scratch for making him do things he doesn't even want to on a coding website for kids, which makes him really angry and is why he is here suing scratch

---

You play as Scratch Cat, who's been forced to play parts in games and animations all around the world. He's on a mission to sue Scratch for his torture. You can find friends along the way, like Sans, the skeleton, who works there for some reason, and more!

Still in development.
